cards.title: Afghans spend night in open after earthquake kills more than 800
cards.summary: Survivors of an earthquake in Afghanistan have spent a night in the open, as rescue efforts continue.

cards.title: Covered in dust and too shocked to speak': Afghan villagers reel at scale of qua…
cards.summary: At least 800 people have died in Afghanistan after a deadly earthquake, the BBC's Gabriela Pomeroy reports.

cards.title: Body seen in secret mortuary could solve 50-year mystery of vanished religious l…
cards.summary: In our series of letters from African journalists, the BBC's weekly The Boss series profiles different people from around the world. This week we speak to Musa al-Sadr.

cards.title: North Korea's Kim crosses border into China in armoured train
cards.summary: The leader of North Korea has crossed the border into China, where he will be attending a military parade on Wednesday.

cards.title: Kim Jong Un enters China ahead of Beijing military parade
cards.summary: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has arrived in China to attend a military parade with his Chinese counterparts.

cards.title: Venezuela accuses the US of seeking 'regime change
cards.summary: Venezuela has declared a " republic in arms" in response to the US military deployment of warships in the southern Caribbean.

cards.title: US: Police probing death at Burning Man festival as homicide
cards.summary: A man has been found dead at a music festival in the US state of Nevada, officials say, after being found lying on the ground.

cards.title: Why are Yemen's Houthi group targeting aid workers?
cards.summary: Yemen's Houthi rebel group has launched a "major security crackdown" on international aid workers.

cards.title: North Korea’s Kim Jong Un crossed into China via train, state media say
cards.summary: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has arrived in China for a three-day visit, state media say.

cards.title: Belgium to recognise Palestine, impose sanctions on Israel
cards.summary: Belgium has announced that it will recognise Palestinian statehood at the United Nations later this year, amid rising tensions between Israel and Palestine.

cards.title: Trump to grant former New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani highest civilian honour
cards.summary: The former mayor of New York, Rudy Giuliani, is to receive a Medal of Freedom.

cards.title: Israeli forces kill pregnant woman and her unborn baby in Gaza City assault
cards.summary: The Israeli military has continued its assault on Gaza, killing at least four people and wounding dozens of others.
